room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Escape Room Mystery in King of Prussia
review: Clean and friendly staff. The 'Laboratory' was difficult but well worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Escape Room Mystery in King of Prussia
review: Great experience. We did the Laboratory and it was challenging. Our guide, Andrew, made it even better. He was helpful and fun. I would recommend this place to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by Escape Room Mystery in King of Prussia
review: Had a great time escaping the Laboratory with my husband, three kids ages 16-32 and a family friend. The lab was challenging and creative and our guide was helpful and fun. We really enjoyed the hour and were so excited to escape with 10 minutes to spare. The facility is clean and easy to find. Highly recommend this location and the Laboratory experience.
